title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4121.2 - Procedure after protest
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4121.2 - Procedure after protest

State Regulations

The judges shall investigate each protest and where
appropriate shall summon the parties thereto and examine them. In the event
that the parties to the horses being protested refuse to appear or be examined
the horse shall be scratched or disqualified and all entrance fees
forfeited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

4121.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
